```{r,results = 'asis'}
pkgs = names(sessionInfo()$otherPkgs)

invisible(lapply(seq_along(pkgs), function(n, pkgs) {
    pkg = pkgs[[n]]
    cat(paste0("### ", n, ". ", pkg, "\n"))
    print(citation(pkg))
    return(NULL)
}, pkgs))

```
